thread.title: Jose Mourinho tells Luke Shaw he has to wait for his chance to start in Manchester United’s defence after leaving Englishman out of Europa League squad to play St Etienne
thread.title_full: Jose Mourinho tells Luke Shaw he has to wait for his chance to start in Manchester United’s defence after leaving Englishman out of Europa League squad to play St Etienne

author: aterrell
title: Jose Mourinho tells Luke Shaw he has to wait for his chance to start in Manchester United’s defence after leaving Englishman out of Europa League squad to play St Etienne
text:
EFL It's not cheap Jose Mourinho tells Luke Shaw he has to wait for his chance to start in Manchester United’s defence after leaving Englishman out of Europa League squad to play St Etienne 
United boss tells young left back that he cannot get into the first-team on the cheap Breaking
